reason: The market is exhibiting strong underlying bullish sentiment, driven by growing institutional adoption and long-term investor outlook as evidenced by JPMorgan's bullish stance and VCs playing a 15-year game. There's a clear shift towards utility over speculative hype and increasing generational trust in decentralized code. However, immediate regulatory scrutiny, highlighted by the grilling of SEC's Paul Atkins on enforcement, introduces short-term volatility and uncertainty, warranting caution despite the positive long-term outlook.
headlines: Ondo and Securitize execs say utility, not hype, will drive tokenization’s next phase
SEC's Paul Atkins grilled on crypto enforcement pull-back, including with Justin Sun, Tron
JPMorgan bullish on crypto for rest of year as institutional flows set to drive recovery
Why crypto VCs at Consensus Hong Kong are playing a 15-year game
Crypto Long & Short: Gen Z trusts code over bank promises
